column4: how do i make ubuntu stop bothering me about upgrading wine? i don't want 0.9.31, it messes WoW up
well you can tell aptitude to keep the package at its current version
it should put an applet by the clock.  Just right click on the applet and check box show rhythmbox
yeah.... that has absolutely nothing to do with my question. i want the CLOSE button to do what the CLOSE button should do, and CLOSE the window, instead of being a QUIT button.
